channel.title: Comments on: Microsoft gives away free licenses of Windows Vista, Office 2007
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
Hehe... all 5 readers of this blog went on the same time? Very un-probable.
The web server of that website probably runs Microsoft IIS.
item.content:encoded:
Hehe… all 5 readers of this blog went on the same time? Very un-probable.

The web server of that website probably runs Microsoft IIS.

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description: Why the hell did you have to tell everyone??? Now their website can't handle the volume!
item.content:encoded: Why the hell did you have to tell everyone??? Now their website can’t handle the volume!
